text: Mariyu (jnapakam cesukondi) allah neravercavalasina panini neravercataniki - miru (badr yud'dharanganlo) markoninapudu - vari (avisvasula) sain'yanni mi kannulaku koddiga cupadu mariyu mim'malni koddimandiga variki cupadu. Mariyu anni vyavaharalu (nirnayaniki) allah vaipunake maralimpabadatayi
